name: Nazarick's Greatest Strategist, Demiurge
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "The Operation's True Intent" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room." "Choose 1 level 2 or higher 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: Or I should hope you know if you're not a fool.

name: True Capability, Narberal
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: You have a lot to learn about being a caster.

name: The Founding of the Sorcerer Kingdom, Demiurge
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if this card is in the middle position of your center stage, move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText: My Lord! My Sorcerer King. We are unworthy of such praise!

name: Human Interactions, Lupusregina
text: 【CONT】 This card can be played from your hand without fulfilling color requirements. 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +5000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Cruel Nature" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 or 《Carne Village》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 2 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 or 《Carne Village》 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand. If you do not pay the cost, choose up to 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 or 《Carne Village》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Good old Enny. You still make the cutest little scream when you're scared.

name: Beautiful Adventurer, Nabe
text: 【AUTO】 When your climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: Such flattery will get you-

name: The Founding of the Sorcerer Kingdom, Shalltear
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】." 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck face up underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your main phase, if there is a marker underneath this card, and your level is 2 or higher, put this card into your waiting room, choose up to 1 "Confronting Despair, Shalltear" in your hand, and put it in the stage position this card was in.
flavorText: I offer you my strength, my life, and my body, to do with however you see fit, o' noble Sorcerer King.

name: Confronting Despair, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. At the end of this card's attack, if "An Escape's End" is in your climax area, and there is no character facing this card or the character facing this card is 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, choose this card and 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, exchange them, and 【STAND】 this card. (Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: What you see before you is the sixth floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. In other words, we're underground right now.

name: Gazing at the Intruder, CZ
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."
flavorText: Which means their party's frontline has been destroyed.

name: Confirming the Operation, Shalltear
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I still don't grasp your meaning.

name: Initiation for Visitors, Demiurge
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Pardon, Lord. I cannot abide this blasphemy. These humans stand here as if they're your equals. I must correct this.

name: Easy Victory, Lupusregina
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 or 《Carne Village》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 or 《Carne Village》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Whoa, that's a smell. Kinda reminds me of hamburgers.

name: Naked Companionship, Demiurge
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: Well, being naked is his normal state of being.

name: A Demand for an Exchange, Momon
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the bottom X cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Humanoid Race》 characters you have. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: And in exchange? What will you give me?

name: Post-Event Report, Entoma
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your back stage.
flavorText: Excuse me, Lord Ainz.

name: Seductive Battle Maid, Solution
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If all of those cards are 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, choose 1 level 3 or lower character in your opponent's back stage. That character cannot 【STAND】 during your opponent's next stand phase. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: A Boring Assault, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: This is already boring. Do me a favor and clean up the rest of them.

name: Fists to Strike Evil, Sebas
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "A New Life, Tuare" get +500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】."

name: Learning Martial Arts, Hamusuke
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, you may put it face up underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: And continue to train until I become Warrior Hamusuke I shall!

name: A New Life, Tuare
flavorText: Sebas: "Tuare is only human. Please keep her training geared with that in mind, Lady Pestonya."

name: Prompt Apology, Narberal
text: 【CONT】 If there is a climax in your opponent's climax area, the character facing this card gets -1 soul. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: Of course not, I'm sorry!

name: A Reward of an Encyclopedia
text: Put all cards from your hand into your waiting room, draw X cards, put the top card of your deck into your clock, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of cards put into your waiting room by this effect +1.
flavorText: This was a gift from Lord Ainz, by the way!

name: The Operation's True Intent
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Oh goodness. Lord Ainz. I think it would be beneficial to tell Shalltear and the others your true intentions.

name: Cruel Nature
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Teeheehee!

name: An Escape's End
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)
flavorText: Well, you're done at least. I'm just getting to the good part. Though I am a bit disappointed you didn't break down into tears for me.

name: Throne of the Founding Declaration, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your encore step, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Ainz: "No matter my title, "Ainz" will suffice."

name: Dark Elf Beast Tamer, Aura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Right! I'll eat well and fill out enough to make old Shalltear blush!

name: Timid Floor Guardian, Mare
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room." "Your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards except that card from their waiting room to their deck, and shuffles their deck." 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Emissary to the Empire" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: It's just that. I genuinely do think you're cool!

name: Sorcerer King, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Iä Shub-Niggurath" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, and you have another 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Choose up to 5 "Black Little Goats" in your waiting room, and put them face up underneath this card in any order as markers." "Put all markers underneath this card into your memory, choose X of your opponent's characters, and put them into their waiting room. X is equal to the number of cards put into your memory by this effect." "Deal 1 damage to your opponent, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Now, applaud. My power is sublime! Should it not be celebrated?

name: Throne of the Founding Declaration, Mare
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I will give it my best! And I'll work hard every day!

name: Discussion About the Future, Demiurge
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: As you've likely heard.

name: Delightful Words, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players perform the following action. "If your memory has 5 or more cards, choose 4 cards in your memory, and put all cards except those cards in your memory into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 When your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character attacks, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Ainz: "And of course, that includes the two of you as well, Albedo and Cixous."

name: A Return Gift from Shub-Niggurath, Ainz
text: 【CONT】 "Black Little Goats" in your hand get -1 cost. 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Iä Shub-Niggurath" is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your "Sorcerer King, Ainz", and that character gets +4500 power until end of turn and the following abilities until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects." "【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card and this card's battle opponent cannot become 【REVERSE】."
flavorText: You look well, Master Stronoff.

name: The Founding of the Sorcerer Kingdom, Aura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When "Emissary to the Empire" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "A Timid Floor Guardian, Mare" in your hand, and put it in any position of your stage. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.
flavorText: So long as we fight for the glory of the Sorcerer King, nothing will stop us!

name: Unexpected Outcome, Ainz
text: 【CONT】 If your level is 2 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 "Sorcerer King, Ainz" in your hand, and put it in the stage position that this card was in." 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock & Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: But the Horn of the Goblin General isn't supposed to be that badass. It's just some garbage item that summons a few low-level goblins. Not like, a whole army.

name: A Moment of Relaxation, Mare
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into their memory, and your opponent puts that character from their memory in any position of their stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Blade to Strike Rebels, Albedo
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 This ability does not activate if it is the starting player's first turn. When this card attacks, if "Protector of the King" is in your climax area, you have another 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, and your hand has 6 or less cards, choose up to 1 level 0 or lower 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, put it in an open position of your stage, and you cannot perform 4 or more attacks until end of turn.
flavorText: I would see it as treason against the ruler of this land and crush you!

name: Escaping Laughter, Albedo
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Boundless Obsessive Love, Albedo" get +1000 power. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Boundless Obsessive Love, Albedo", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Hehehe...

name: Hypocritical Master, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: I forgot to tell you. Try as I might, I have a tendency to be- hypocritical.

name: Deputy Leader of the Pleiades, Yuri
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets +6000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, you may choose 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Though I am pleased to see everyone so motivated.

name: Fervent Excuse, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 [Return 2 characters from your waiting room to your deck & Shuffle your deck] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, this character's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: However, the risk was more than worth it given what I stood to gain.

name: Applause to the Master, Mare
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play events or "Backup" from your hand.

name: Terrain Manipulation, Mare
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Opening Speech, Aura", this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: There!

name: Unable to Agree, Aura
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 "Cold-Blooded Pursuer, Shalltear" from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +1500 power and the following abilities until end of turn. " 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step." "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: I know I should just smile and agree, but this is absolutely twisted.

name: Opening Speech, Aura
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [(1) 【REST】 this 【STAND】 character] When the battle opponent of your other "Terrain Manipulation, Mare" becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: He's the illustrious overlord of the Great Tomb of Nazarick! The King of Death itself. Lord Ainz Ooal Gown!

name: Delayed Realization, Cocytus
text: 【CONT】 If you have another level 3 or higher character, this card gets +4000 power. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets +3000 power.
flavorText: I see. Understood.

name: Calling for the Emperor, Aura
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +7000 power and +2 soul.
flavorText: Emperor! Step up or we'll kill you all!

name: Black Little Goats
text: If you do not have a character with "Ainz(アインズ)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【CONT】 You may put up to 5 cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【AUTO】 Memory [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] If this card is in your memory, at the beginning of your encore step, if you have "Sorcerer King, Ainz", you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: BaaAAA~~!!

name: War Bicon Lord
text: Choose 1 of your characters, and put it into your stock. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card has 1 or more of the same trait as the character put into your stock by this effect, put that card in any position of your stage. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: Aura: "He's acting strange." Albedo: "What could it be?"

name: Iä Shub-Niggurath
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Yes. Now the festival of destruction can begin.

name: Emissary to the Empire
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: If no one comes to apologize for this offense, he will reduce your country to ash!

name: Protector of the King
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText:
Lord Ainz will not be disrespected.
It's a crime punishable by death.

name: Sentiments Toward Subordinates, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if all of your characters are 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 event or level 1 or lower character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I consider you all to be my treasures.

name: Petite and Beautiful Vampire, Shalltear
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the end of this card's attack, if "Punishment by Humiliation" is in your climax area, you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and there is no character facing this card or the character facing this card is 【REVERSE】, choose up to 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, put it into your hand, and you may put this card into your memory. If you put this card in your memory, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Petite and Beautiful Vampire, Shalltear" in your memory, and put it in any position of your stage.
flavorText: I'll look it up for you. You might drown in your own ignorance at this rate.

name: Dedicated Love for the Lord, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Intent of the Operation, Albedo", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Unsuppressible Feelings" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, deal 1 damage to your opponent, and during your opponent's climax phase or during this card's battle, you cannot receive damage by 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters until the end of your opponent's next turn. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Something special that's ours alone.

name: Deathbringer, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I am death. And I have come for you.

name: Cornerlady, Albedo
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.

name: The Founding of the Sorcerer Kingdom, Sebas
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Summoning Cavalry Beast, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters among those cards ×1000. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, your opponent chooses 1 event or character from among them, you put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Come to me, my cavalry beast!

name: The Founding of the Sorcerer Kingdom, Ainz
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "The Sorcerer Kingdom of Ainz Ooal Gown" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Thank you for your kind words. But we are as close as family. Indeed, I consider you the children of my dearest friends.

name: The Surprising Truth, Shalltear
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 5 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Praises to the Lord, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if you have another character with "Shalltear(シャルティア)" in its card name, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Well, that's our Lord Ainz for you! Ten steps ahead of the rest.

name: Newlywed Roleplay, Albedo
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your back stage, and you have another "Cute Blunder, Albedo" in your back stage, "Overlord, Ainz" get -1 cost while in your hand. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Normally, roleplay etiquette dictates that a new bride greet her husband dressed in nothing but an apron for the final showdown.

name: Intent of the Operation, Albedo
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] When "Unsuppressible Feelings" is placed on your climax area, if your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Dedicated Love for the Lord, Albedo" in your waiting room, put it in the stage position this card was in, choose up to 1 "Sentiments Out of Control" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: All of our actions must be justified.

name: Entertaining Intruders, Ainz
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: HAHAHAHA!!

name: Discussion About the Future, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, this card gets +1000 power and +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I have gathered you here to discuss our future.

name: Consistent Efforts, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Horn of the Goblin General" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Is this a good pose? Might look cooler if I bent my forearm inwards some.

name: Cold-Blooded Pursuer, Shalltear
flavorText: I think that's enough hide and seek.

name: A Fight in the Spa, Ainz
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: Don your armor and weapons. We shall enter the women's bath!

name: Point of Obstruction, Sebas
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.
flavorText: I'd appreciate it if you'd focus your attention on me.

name: Idle Talk in the Audience, Shalltear
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: As if your pathetic country could ever be more than-

name: Sentiments Out of Control
text: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have "Dedicated Love for the Lord, Albedo", this card cannot be played from your hand. If your level is 2, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -3 soul." [(1)] If your level is 3, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -3 soul."
flavorText: Oh, Lord Ainz! I've tried so hard but I can't hold back any longer!

name: True Death
text: If you do not have a 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters, and put it into their waiting room.
flavorText: Farewell, Gazef Stronoff. I'm sorry it had to end this way.

name: Unsuppressible Feelings
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Lord Ainz! Lord Ainz!

name: Punishment by Humiliation
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. ([[comeback.gif]]: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Without a doubt, Ainz my lord. Their faces were riddled with delicious fear.

name: The Sorcerer Kingdom of Ainz Ooal Gown
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Your efforts have done me a great honor.

name: Four-Arm Warrior, Cocytus
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》, this card gets +1000 power. 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if you have another 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.
flavorText: Lord Ainz is unrivaled in magic. The people he rules should know that.

name: The Founding of the Sorcerer Kingdom, Cocytus
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]" until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: No matter the trial and no matter the order, I shall not hesitate.

name: Petite Magic Caster, Evileye
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, if there is a climax in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Foolish. Utterly foolish.

name: The Face of Kindness, Renner
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 If you do not have another "The Face of Kindness, Renner", after you have performed the chosen 【CXCOMBO】 effect of your ""Blue Rose" Evileye", you may choose up to 1 of the effects that was not chosen, and perform it." 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If your opponent has 5 or less cards in their waiting room, your opponent puts the top 5 cards of their deck into their waiting room.
flavorText: I'd like you to deliver these flowers there for me.

name: A Leader's Resolution, Enri
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Carne Village》 characters get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Carne Village》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When "Last Resort" is placed on your climax area, if you have 2 or more other 《Carne Village》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of other "Goblin Elite Guards" in your center stage. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I understand.

name: Reluctant Parting, Evileye
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock.
flavorText: I'd very much like to accompany you, but.

name: Moving Forward Hand in Hand, Enri
text: 【CONT】 Assist During your turn, if your hand has 5 or more cards, all of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Nfirea: "Let's go."

name: Gruelling Battle, Evileye
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another blue or 《Raven Black》 character, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Forgotten Feelings" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other blue or 《Raven Black》 characters, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Tch!!

name: Words of Appreciation, Cocytus
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Ainz: "You all fulfilled your roles splendidly during our operation in the kingdom of Re-Estize."

name: Sentiments Towards the Villagers, Jugem
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Carne Village》 characters, this card gets +8000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets the following abilities until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +2000 power." "【CONT】 Great Performance"
flavorText: But let's be frank. Us old men are the only ones who should be risking their lives.

name: Goblin Elite Guards
text: 【CONT】 You may put up to 13 cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the effect of "Horn of the Goblin General", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if you have another "A Leader's Resolution, Enri", you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Though it appears my services aren't needed here.

name: Bloody Emperor, Jircniv
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in your center stage, all of your blue or 《Raven Black》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to their deck, and your opponent shuffles their deck.
flavorText: Eventually, we'll need to form an alliance against Ainz Ooal Gown. But no one will bite until they understand how dangerous he is.

name: A Conversation With the Family, Renner
text: 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your main phase, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card from your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, and you have 3 or more characters with 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 or "Climb(クライム)" in their card names, at the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: In Pure White Armor, Climb
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if "A Conversation With the Family, Renner" is in your clock, this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"A Conversation With the Family, Renner" [Put the top card of your deck into your clock & 【REST】 this card] (When this card is played and placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "A Conversation With the Family, Renner" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: And although I don't deserve such an honor. I'll bring his sword.

name: Goblin Military Band
text: 【CONT】 You may put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. If you revealed 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 《Carne Village》 character from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

name: Alone in the City, Enri
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 "Horn of the Goblin General" from your hand into your memory] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Sentiments Towards the Villagers, Jugem" in your hand, and put it in any position of your stage. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: She seemed really annoyed with me.

name: Chance to Appeal, Nfirea
text: 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If there are no markers underneath this card, choose 1 《Carne Village》 character in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Put 1 marker underneath this card into your stock.
flavorText: Leave it to me! I'll take good care of you, I promise!

name: Goblin Heavy Infantry Corps
text: 【CONT】 You may put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Carne Village》 characters, this card gets +4000 power.
flavorText: We shall crush your paltry forces beneath our boots!

name: The Warrior Captain's Resolution, Gazef
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of blue or 《Raven Black》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your blue or 《Raven Black》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: But I must challenge you to a duel!

name: A Turbulent Break, Cocytus
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "Male Floor Guardian's Break" from your climax area into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 4 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Ainz: "I assume this is one of Luci★Fer's pranks, but we must rush to their aid all the same!"

name: Promise Under the Moon, Brain
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: I think you took the easy way out! You threw your life away instead of facing me!

name: Horn of the Goblin General
text: If you do not have a character with "Enri(エンリ)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Put this card into your memory. [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] If you have 1 "Horn of the Goblin General" in your memory, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 3 "Goblin Military Band" or "Goblin Heavy Infantry Corps" in your waiting room, and put them in separate positions of your stage. [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] If your level is 3, and you have 2 "Horn of the Goblin General" in your memory, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 3 "Goblin Elite Guards" in your waiting room, and put them in separate positions of your stage.
flavorText: This is worth three thousand gold?

name: Forgotten Feelings
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: How? My heart stopped beating a long time ago.

name: Last Resort
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Goblins. Please, help us.

name: Male Floor Guardian's Break
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: Affirmative Demiurge
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position of the stage.
flavorText: None other, my lord.

name: The Pursuit Begins, Shalltear
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 1 card, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: As you wish, Lord Ainz.

name: Reading Time, Mare
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters among those cards ×1000.

name: Brimming with Confidence, Aura
text: 【AUTO】 [(4) Put 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and 【REST】 it. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: If I send in a few of my pets, it'll be easy!

name: Floor Guardian of the 5th Floor, Cocytus
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card direct attacks, you may choose 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: Everlasting Devotion, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card direct attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Time Halt, Ainz
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 level 3 or lower character in your opponent's back stage. That character cannot 【STAND】 during your opponent's next stand phase. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 2 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: One note. You should always prepare countermeasures against time spells.

name: Hidden Feelings, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character attacks, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Deepening Love, Albedo
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Grotesque Race》 or 《Nazarick》 characters, and that card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
